titleinfo.title: Indians for Indians Radio Show, October 8, 1946

mods.tableOfContents: Performers: Rev. J.L. Raney; Pastors Yale Spottedbird, Duke Tsoodle, and James Twohatchet. Performances: A very brief program; Kiowa Hymns (6)
mods.note: When citing recordings from this collection, please using the following: Indians for Indians Radio Show. Western History Collections, University of Oklahoma Libraries.
